about_the_game:
You work as a staff member in a hostess club, but due to an unfortunate incident, you end up bringing down the entire business. Now, only you and the club’s owner remain, relying on each other for survival (or something more?).

The owner decides to take a gamble by converting the club into a mahjong parlor, and you are entrusted with a major responsibility. Your mission is to find attractive women of various types to boost the parlor’s popularity.

In addition, by using the skills from the Secret Mahjong Manual, not only can you enhance your own abilities, but you can also teach the female characters to act as your accomplices at the table, helping you win over key characters.

                          

Convenient Assistance System for Quickly Mastering Taiwanese Mahjong

"Mahjong, Sex & Girls" is an adult-oriented mahjong game based on the 16-tile Taiwanese Mahjong rules.

To help newcomers to mahjong, the game provides various assistance systems to enhance gameplay. For example, during the ready hand stage, the game suggests which tile to discard for the most potential points or the highest tile count, and it also offers computer assistance for automatic play.

Utilize Special Skills to Dominate the Game

Players can learn various skills in the game, such as starting with a Mixed One Suit or ensuring a Self-Draw, which help you dominate the table. You can also team up with the players on either side and use their skills to strategize against the opponent female character.

Six Unique Female Characters

Characters include a boss lady, married woman, band vocalist, esports streamer, cheerleader, and flight attendant, each with their own unique charm, adding a layer of romance to the game.

Multiple Game Modes

In addition to the story mode, a free mode unlocks as you progress. You can choose character and customize game rules to engage in round after round of exciting mahjong battles.

Fully Voiced Characters

With 18 fully-animated adult scenes and voiced general dialogue, female characters are voiced throughout the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is not suitable for all ages.

The adult content in this game includes frequent nudity and sex scenes. Please make sure you are comfortable with this content before continuing. All characters involved in adult content are adults.
